ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] An Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: Well met, Stauchand. Which server are you playing on and where are you currently camped at? Chervis Ranger 31th Season ... The Barrel On Wed, 11 Sep 2002
ygData.messageBody:
Well met, Stauchand.

Which server are you playing on and where are you currently camped at?

Chervis
Ranger
31th Season
---
The Barrel

On Wed, 11 Sep 2002 14:24:40
sibilant_ghost wrote:
>Hello all, my in game name is Stauchnad. I am playing a half-elven
>bard currently at lvl 8. I am new to everquest and am playing
>classic only. I am joining this group to learn what the books won't
>tell me. So, good day all, and let the games begin.
>
> Stauchnad Tier Ss'Faleen
>
>
